import React from "react"; import '../style/profile.css'; import { isLoggedIn } from "../App"; export function Profile(){ const [data, setData] = React.useState(null); React.useEffect(() => { fetch(`/api/profile?userID=${isLoggedIn()}`) .then((res) => {return res.json()}) .then((data) => setData(data)); }, []); return(

{data.firstName}

Full Name
Kenneth Valdez
Email
fip@jukmuh.al
Edit
); }
